All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AccountController
This is the controller class for account.fxml ("My Account" view）
ButtonHandle
This util class is to handle Button's common actions
CalculateBalance
This until class is to calculate user's balance, total income, expense, interest income, fixed deposit, etc.
CSVFileHandler
This until class is to add/edit/delete/get the data from csv data files
DepositController
This is the controller class for deposit.fxml ("Fixed Deposit" view）
EarnController
This is the controller class for earn.fxml ("Earn Money" view）
FileName
This class is to define the constants of csv and picture files name with path
GetTime
This until class is to handle the time related, such as get the time, compare the time, convert time with specific format.
GiftAddController
This is the controller class for gift_add.fxml ("Redeem Gifts" -> "Add a gift" view）
GiftController
This is the controller class for gift.fxml ("Redeem Gifts" view）
GiftInfo
This entity class is to define the gift properties for "Redeem Gifts" module

This is the controller class for gift_purchased.fxml ("Redeem Gifts" -> "History" view）
GiftRedeemController
This is the controller class for gift_redeem.fxml ("Redeem Gifts" -> gifts list view）

This is the controller class for home.fxml ("Home" view）

This is the controller class for login.fxml ("Login" view）
Main
This class is Main class of the KidsBank application.
MenuController
This is the controller class for menu.fxml (Left Menu view in main window）
NoChildController
This is the controller class for no_child.fxml (show the view when parent account does not link to any child account）
PageLoader
This until class is to get the view or load the view in the right area of main window.
ProfileController
This is the controller class for profile.fxml ("Profile" view）
SettingController
This is the controller class for setting.fxml ("Settings" view）
SignupController
This is the controller class for signup.fxml ("Signup" view）

This until class is to handle common String check

This is the controller class for task_add.fxml ("Earn Money" -> "Open Tasks" -> "Add a Task" view）
TaskCompletedController
This is the controller class for task_completed.fxml ("Earn Money" -> "Completed Tasks" view）
TaskEditController

TaskInfo
This entity class is to define the tasks properties for "Earn Money" module
TaskOpenController
This is the controller class for task_open.fxml ("Earn Money" -> "Open Tasks" view）
TaskPendingController
This is the controller class for task_pending.fxml ("Earn Money" -> "Pending Tasks" view）
